text:
Hi everyone,
I am facing some issue.
I am trying to access my developer app but not able to access it.
I am facing the above issue attached in the SS below.
It was working fine yesterday. Without making any changes it is now giving me this error.

Hey <@U08DST9K9H6>,

1. Go to your HubSpot Developer account.
2. Ensure the app you are trying to connect has the necessary *OAuth scopes* enabled.
3. Edit the app's settings and add the required scopes i.e: `crm.lists.read`, `crm.objects.companies.read`, etc.

Hi, has anyone integrated HubSpot with PowerBi without third-party tools to view survey responses? I can already connect to contacts, deals and tickets, but I am interested in having survey response data
